name: Wolpertinger
speed: walk 30 ft., burrow 10 ft., fly 30 ft.

trait.name: Charge
text: If the wolpertinger moves at least 10 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 2 (1d4) piercing damage.

trait.name: Flyby
text: The wolpertinger doesn't provoke an opportunity attack when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

trait.name: Standing Leap
text: The wolpertinger's long jump is up to 20 feet and its high jump is up to 10 feet, with or without a running start.

action.name: Bite
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage.

action.name: Gore
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage.

action.name: Keening (Recharge 6)
text: The wolpertinger emits a piercing shriek.

Each creature within 30 feet that can hear the wolpertinger must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or be deafened for 1 minute. A beast with an Intelligence of 4 or lower that is in the area must also succeed on a DC 13 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened until the beginning of its next turn.
